name: Scott Volk
description:
Scott Volk ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Scott Volk in mp3 format.  Scott Volk has been a Jewish believer in the Messiah since 1975. Scott graduated from North Central University in Minneapolis, MN, where he earned is bachelor’s degree. He is a pastor at FIRE Church in Charlotte, NC, and is the founder and director of Together For Israel
Scott has served alongside Dr. Michael Brown, an internationally known Messianic Christian apologist since 1997, traveling together around the world and ministering in both conference settings as well as in local congregations. Scott’s burden is for the Church to emerge into the expression of what God has destined it to be so as to provoke the lost sheep of the house of Israel to jealousy. Scott has lead 10 trips to Israel and will lead his 11th later this year. Scott, has been married for 24 years to his wife Beth (a full blooded Arab believer). They have a heart to see the Jew and Gentile, united as "one new man" in Messiah. They have five children and reside in Charlotte, North Carolina.
